channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who offered Trump an exceedingly rare second state visit? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week's quiz also features late-night hosts, Emmy losers, the pope, geometry and bears.

item.title: Lawsuit aims to force Trump administration to stop delaying student loan forgiveness

item.title: Still Divided, a Syrian City Ruined in War Edges Back to Life
item.description: Battered by years of bombing and shelling, Deir al-Zour remains a frontline, even as its people struggle to rebuild.
